diff_hunk:
@@ -120,15 +128,20 @@ fi
 EXTRA_PARAMS=""
 
 # Determine if Docker is available
-MAIN_CMD=${DOCKER_MAIN_CMD}
 if [[ -z "$(which docker)" ]]; then
+  DO_DOCKER=0
+
   echo "It appears that Docker is not available on this system. "\
 "Will perform build without Docker."
-  echo "In addition, the additional option flags will be applied to the build:"
+  echo "Also, the additional option flags will be applied to the build:"
   echo "  ${NO_DOCKER_OPT_FLAG}"
-  MAIN_CMD=${NO_DOCKER_MAIN_CMD}
+  MAIN_CMD="${NO_DOCKER_MAIN_CMD} ${CTYPE}"
   OPT_FLAG="${OPT_FLAG} ${NO_DOCKER_OPT_FLAG}"
 
+  # Perform bazel clean in non-Docker environments to ensure a clean build
+  echo "Also, \"${BAZEL_CLEAN_CMD}\" will be performed prior to "\
+"the main build step"
+  DO_BAZEL_CLEAN=1
body: @jendap @martinwicke Alright, how about this? I'll add --genrule_strategy=standalone to without-Docker and get rid of the bazel clean. In the meantime, I'll add bazel clean as an option that can be activated through environment variable "TF_BUILD_BAZEL_CLEAN" (any non-empty and non-0 value).

In the meantime, I'll add bazel clean as an option that can be activated through environment variable "TF_BUILD_BAZEL_CLEAN" (any non-empty and non-0 value).
